AI Engineer.title: AI Engineer
roadmap: Stage 1: Learn Python, Statistics, Linear Algebra
Stage 2: Learn ML libraries (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn)
Stage 3: Work on projects like chatbots, image recognition
Stage 4: Apply for internships in AI-focused companies
Stage 5: Consider M.Tech/MS in AI or relevant certifications

Graphic Designer.title: Graphic Designer
roadmap: Stage 1: Learn Photoshop, Illustrator, Figma
Stage 2: Build a portfolio with creative projects
Stage 3: Freelance / internships in design agencies
Stage 4: Learn UI/UX principles
Stage 5: Transition into senior designer or product design roles

Teacher.title: Teacher
roadmap: Stage 1: Specialize in your favorite subject
Stage 2: Get a teaching certification / B.Ed
Stage 3: Start teaching (school/online)
Stage 4: Upskill with EdTech tools
Stage 5: Become senior faculty or academic researcher

Entrepreneur.title: Entrepreneur
roadmap: Stage 1: Learn basics of finance, marketing, leadership
Stage 2: Build a small project/startup idea
Stage 3: Seek mentorship & incubators
Stage 4: Scale your business
Stage 5: Mentor others and expand network
